name: squishy baby octopus
notes:
with this pattern, you will be able to make as many baby octopi as you would like. this is the perfect project for beginner crocheters.

you will receive two pdf (english & french).

difficulty 
beginner

skills required 
crocheting in spiral, magic ring, chain, slip stitch, single crochet stitch, bobble stitch, increasing and decreasing.

materials 
• about 13g of bulky weight yarn 
i used premier yarns- parfait chunky
• two 12 mm safety eyes 
• 4.50 mm crochet hook 
• polyester fiberfill for stuffing
• yarn needle, scissors, stitch marker

final size 
they are about 6,5 cm (2.5”) high when made with indicated yarn.
